archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Leadership fails to rectify issues they cannot see and we have ever increasing cost of poor quality
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
Leadership fails to fix issues because the issues are not seen. This is not necessarily because of the leadership themselves but may also derive from the supporting roles suffering from the Dunning-Kruger Effect.
When the underlaying architecture issues are not seen or understood its typical for cost of poor quality to be high.
